message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $130. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $110 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
